channel.title: Malectin on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Malectin on funPlantGenes

item.title: GmMLRK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G122000 Gene Symbol: GmMLRK1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A novel soybean malectin-like receptor kinase-encoding gene, GmMLRK1, provides resistance to soybean mosaic virus.

item.title: LeEIX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc07g008630 Gene Symbol: LeEIX2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The tomato (Solanum lycopersicum) LeEIX2 is an RLP that binds ethylene-inducing xylanase (EIX), a fungal elicitor.

item.title: OsMLD1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g03290 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0124300 Gene Symbol: OsMLD1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 ,Â IRGSP-1.

item.title: SlRLK-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g094920.2 Gene Symbol: SlRLK-like Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlRLK-like is a malectin-like domain protein affecting localization and abundance of LeEIX2 receptor resulting in suppression of EIX-induced immune responses.
